_meanings:
{@--1@} To place or put in
the front or at the head, make as a
leader; {#turAsAhaM puroDAya DAma svAyaMBuvaM#}
{#yayuH#} <ls>Ku. 2. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 43.</ls>

{@--2@} To
make a family-priest of any one.

{@--5@} To
place or set before or in front.

{@--7@} To
devote or apply oneself to.
